div.p:
Antonio:
Every choice has its pros and cons. By choosing to deal with the cons of low-risk choices, I get the benefits too, and I protect the things I value. And on the other hand, even though there are some pros for making high-risk choices; they usually lead to outcomes we don’t want, while low-risk choices can lead us to the outcomes we do want. This presents us with an age-old dilemma. Here’s another way to look at it…
